title: P
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''p''' triggers a [[quiver]]ed action; if targeted, aims at the nearest valid target.
*Pressing '''P''' is the command to put on [[jewellery]].

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''p''' represents denizens of [[the Vaults]], as well as [[player ghost]]s.
*'''P''' represents a [[plant]]-type monsters.

==History==
Prior to [[0.19]], pressing '''p''' was the command to [[pray]].
